comments.content:
The logo on their web site uses Univers 85 Extra Black, but it isn’t a match to your image (at least, not to the |M|):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150107153453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/univers/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150107153453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hearst_big_5445.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150107153453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Univers_4293.png)

Will keep looking....

While Univers wasn’t bad for the |H| and |D|, Boldina One comes close for the |M|:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/boldina/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150107153453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/boldina/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/boldina/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150107153453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Boldina_4958.png)

Titling Gothic Narrow Black is also very close:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/titling-gothic-fb/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150107153453/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/titling-gothic-fb/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/titling-gothic-fb/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150107153453im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Titling_5769.png)
